body.p:
Louisville Ky
July 1. 1862
Gov. Magoffin
Frankfort Ky

What, My Dear Governor, has become of My appeal to your mercy in behalf of Jacob Houseman? I sent you up an additional list of Jurymen as petitioners for his pardon. I fear you did not get the letter as Houseman has not yet been pardoned. If anything is wanting to secure his pardon will you, My Dear Governer, inform me what it is so that I may hon it down?
